reviewText: Demystifies the camera and its functions in an easy to understand, conversational manner

Excellent teaching video course. I have learned a great deal about my camera and photography in general from this video course. I particularly appreciate the slow cadence of Michael Andrews' voice and his general teaching style.
Good information and for me I like the way the information is taught/presented. I would recommend.
Very helpful and lots of good information. Wish it was cheaper, but the guy put lots of work into the crash course.

As an amateur photographer this video has saved me so much time. It has given me so many tips and tricks that will help me in my everyday photography. And I can honestly say that not knowing too much about this camera, I feel VERY comfortable with now using it. So detailed and descriptive. I would highly recommend this!
